h1.span: Community Input Requested on School Closure

span.p: In light of Governor DeWine's decision this week to physically close schools to students for the remainder of this school year, we would like your input on how we are doing as a District in our response this pandemic and we would like your input on issues you would like us to consider as we proceed in the days and weeks ahead. Please feel free to offer multiple comments on our current response and questions or comments on what you would like to see in the next month.

We are asking for your participation in a ThoughtExchange survey. Please follow the link and participate by offering your thoughts on how the actions we have taken thus far and what you would like us to know as we move forward. Please offer your comments and come back to star the thoughts of other participants as well.
This survey is about the current and near future response to the shutdown. We will address summer and fall plans at a later date.
